Trims Moldings.title: Proud Valance with Return
Trims Moldings.imageTitle: Proud Valance - with Return - with Detailed edge
Trims Moldings.description: The Proud Valance is typically used over sinks to bridge between wall cabinets, or set inside an open cabinet.

standards.title: Construction
standards.content: Available in composite core or solid material.

standards.title: Height
standards.content: Specify height (max. 8").

standards.title: Finish
standards.content: All faces and edges are finished except for valance ends.

options.title: DE
options.content: A detailed edge is applied to the front bottom edge.

restrictions: Detailed Edge only available in Solid WOOD and Painted MDF.
Not available on Euro Materials.

notes.title: Grain
notes.content: runs horizontally and does not change according to the Exterior Material Header Drop - down Menu selection.

content.description: 4' Proud Valance with Return
8' Proud Valance with Return
10' Proud Valance with Return
4' Proud Valance with Return and a detailed edge
8' Proud Valance with Return and a detailed edge
10' Proud Valance with Return and a detailed edge

Trims Moldings.title: Applied Molding (AM)
Trims Moldings.description: The Proud Valance is typically used over sinks to bridge between wall cabinets, or set inside an open cabinet.

standards.title: Construction
standards.content: Available in all materials with a composite core.

standards.title: Finish
standards.content: The top, bottom and 1 edge are finished. The front edge is taped except with painted applications.

options.title: DE edges
options.content: A detailed edge is applied to the front bottom edge and top edge.

options.title: (DE) Construction
options.content: Made from solid wood or MDF if painted.

content.description: 4' Molding
8' Molding
10' Molding (excludes Engineered, Melamine and QS White Oak)
4' Molding with a detailed edge
8' Molding with a detailed edge
10' Molding with a detailed edge (excludes Melamine)

Trims Moldings.title: Toekick (TK)
Trims Moldings.description: For use with Nickels leg leveller system.

standards.title: Construction
standards.content: 3/4" thick composite core material finished to match the color and material of the cabinets exterior or with an aluminum finish.

standards.title: Supplied with
standards.content: A kerf and notch in the back to integrate with the leg leveller system.

options.title: TK
options.content: To match color and material of cabinet exterior

options.title: TKSW
options.content: 3/4‚Äù thick solid wood material finished to match the color and material of the cabinet exterior.

restrictions: Grain runs horizontally and does not change according to the Exterior Material Header Drop-down Menu selection.

options.description: 6" High: 5 3/4" - 6 11/16" with clip and hub, ship loose.
5 1/2" High: 5 5/16" - 6 1/4" with clip and hub, ship loose.
4 1/2" High: 4 1/8" - 5 1/8" with clip and hub, ship loose.
4" High: 3 3/8" - 4 1/4" with clip and hub, ship loose.

legLeveller.optionsTitle: Available in 4 sizes with the adjustable height ranges as shown:
legLeveller.description: Black Polymer adjustable height legs with a 650 lb/leveller capacity.
legLeveller.title: Leg Levellers
standards: Include Black Polymer baseboard attachment with metal clips.
Select the desired leg leveller height from the drop down menu in the cabinet selection/edit screen
To eliminate the leg levellers and be credited for them, select "no" from the drop down menu.

notes.content: toekicks are only available in Painted and Wood Veneer (except Engineered) materials.

content.description: Match color and material of cabinet exterior
Aluminum finish
3/4" thick solid wood material

Trims Moldings.description: 3/4" thick unfinished material.

standards.title: Construction
standards.content: 3/4" thick unfinished material.

options.title: Skin for Sitebuilt kicks (VS)
options.content: 3/16" thick baseboard skin material is available to match the color and material of the cabinets

options.title: TK-LADDERPACK
options.content: Ladder pack - 4.5" High - 2 x 8' and 8 x 2' foot pieces

Plywood

Trims Moldings.title: Proud Kick 1
Trims Moldings.description: 3/4" thick material or 7/8" Solid wood with optional return and detailed edge

standards.title: Construction
standards.content: Available in a 3/4" veneer/composite core with a taped edge in all materials.

standards.title: DE Construction
standards.content: 7/8" Solid wood.

options.title: DE edges
options.content: A detailed edge is applied to the front bottom edge.

restrictions: All returns for moldings are made of composite core material, regardless of whether or not the molding to which it is attached is made of solid or composite material.
Grain runs horizontally and does not change according to the Exterior Material Header Drop-down Menu selection.
10' excludes, Engineered Melamine and QS White Oak, limitations of the material.

notes.title: Moldings
notes.content: While moldings are often shown as available in 4', 8', or 10' lengths, Nickels is unable to stock moldings in specific lengths. We will supply moldings based on the total order quantity.

notes.title: Order consisting
notes.content: When an order consisting of 10' lengths is placed, we will send a minimum of one 10' length and the rest of the order will consist of minimum 8' lengths with 1 extra piece to complete the total footage required in the order. When more than one 10' length is required, the quantity must be noted on the order and we will meet the request

notes.title: Defects
notes.content: When a defective piece of molding is sent, an additional piece will be sent to compensate for the defective length lost, plus 1'.

standards.title: Finishing
standards.content: Except for ends(2) all surfaces are finished.

standards.title: Specify

options.title: (DE) Construction

restrictions: Grain runs horizontally and does not change according to the Exterior Material Header Drop-down Menu selection.
Not available in Engineered.
